html: As families across America prepare to travel for the Thanksgiving holiday this week, Congress has once again prematurely closed shop, this time, with seven of the twelve spending bills still outstanding.pic.twitter.com/Fq2bCznE2i
text: As families across America prepare to travel for the Thanksgiving holiday this week, Congress has once again prematurely closed shop, this time, with seven of the twelve spending bills still outstanding.pic.twitter.com/Fq2bCznE2i

html: It has been over 20 yrs since Congress passed all spending bills before the end of the new fiscal year. The failure of Congress to do its basic job of funding the government and instead rely on stopgap spending measures has created needless waste, disruption, and inefficiencies.
text: It has been over 20 yrs since Congress passed all spending bills before the end of the new fiscal year. The failure of Congress to do its basic job of funding the government and instead rely on stopgap spending measures has created needless waste, disruption, and inefficiencies.

html: That is why I am introducing a legislative fix with my colleagues, @RepDerekKilmer and @SenJoniErnst, to implement a “No Budget, No Recess” provision in our budgeting and appropriations process as a way to hold Congress accountable to the same standards as the American people.
text: That is why I am introducing a legislative fix with my colleagues, @RepDerekKilmer and @SenJoniErnst, to implement a “No Budget, No Recess” provision in our budgeting and appropriations process as a way to hold Congress accountable to the same standards as the American people.

html: The next step in reforming our budget and appropriations process is to encourage more fiscal responsibility by reducing deficit spending and our mountainous debt, which remains the challenge of the 21st Century and the greatest threat to the next generation.
text: The next step in reforming our budget and appropriations process is to encourage more fiscal responsibility by reducing deficit spending and our mountainous debt, which remains the challenge of the 21st Century and the greatest threat to the next generation.

html: Ever since my first job at West Side Video in Port Angeles, I’ve never had a job where I expected my boss to approve a leave request if my work wasn’t finished. Congress ought to function the same way. That's why, w/ @reparrington, I'm introducing a "No Budget, No Recess" plan.
text: Ever since my first job at West Side Video in Port Angeles, I’ve never had a job where I expected my boss to approve a leave request if my work wasn’t finished. Congress ought to function the same way. That's why, w/ @reparrington, I'm introducing a "No Budget, No Recess" plan.

html: It’s time for comprehensive reform to Congress’s budgeting process that incentivizes progress over partisanship. That’s the driving force behind the "No-budget, No-recess" amendment @RepArrington and I will offer next week. https://bit.ly/2FA0fQu
text: It’s time for comprehensive reform to Congress’s budgeting process that incentivizes progress over partisanship. That’s the driving force behind the "No-budget, No-recess" amendment @RepArrington and I will offer next week. https://bit.ly/2FA0fQu
